categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Graul was a Human male Imperial commander of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War.

In 3643 BBY, Graul assisted Lord Sadic in the creation of Mark I Power Guards on Nar Shaddaa. He was present in the Red Light Sector when he encountered the Hero of Tython, who was there to destroy several power conduits around the sector. Graul was tasked with preventing the Jedi Knight from ruining Sadic's plan. Graul engaged the Hero with several Mark I Power Guards, but they were all killed by the Jedi. After Graul's death, the Hero recovered an encrypted datapad from the Commander's body. His datapad revealed the location of an Imperial weapons factory in the Lower Industrial Sector, where the Power Guard project had been moved to.
